text: Smartex Godfrey Tambala (born 30 July 1965) is a Malawian former long-distance runner. Smartex competed in the marathon at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona, finishing 63rd. His personal best in the event was 2:17:18, achieved in 1991, which is also the current Malawian national record. At the 1994 Commonwealth Games in Victoria, Smartex crossed the line in 17th place in the marathon, just ahead of fellow African athlete Moses Matabane of Lesotho. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Malawian male long- distance runners Category:Olympic athletes of Malawi Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Malawi Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1994 Commonwealth Games
title: Smartex Tambala
